<style>
.schedule-container {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
}

.day-section {
  background: #f8f9fc;
  border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
  display: none;
}

.time-block {
  border-left: 3px solid #2c3e50;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  margin: 15px 0;
  background: white;
}

.session-title {
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin: 15px 0 10px;
  font-size: 1.1em;
}

.presentation-item {
  margin: 12px 0;
  padding: 8px 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
}

.chair-info {
  color: #7b8a8b;
  font-size: 0.9em;
  margin: -8px 0 12px;
  font-style: italic;
}

.special-event {
  background: #f8f9fc;
  border-left-color: #18bc9c;
}

.meal-break {
  border-left-color: #18bc9c;
  background: #f3faf9;
}

.alert-custom {
  background: #f8f9fc;
  border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
  color: #7b8a8b;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.collapse-button {
  background: #2c3e50;
  color: white;
  padding: 8px 15px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin: 10px 0;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: left;
}

.collapse-button:hover {
  background: #18bc9c;
}

}
</style>

<script>
    function toggleDay(dayId) {
      var content = document.getElementById(dayId);
      // Use computed style for accuracy
      var isHidden = window.getComputedStyle(content).display === "none";
      var button = document.querySelector(`button[onclick="toggleDay('${dayId}')"]`);
      
      if (isHidden) {
        content.style.display = "block";
        button.innerHTML = button.innerHTML.replace('▼', '▲');
      } else {
        content.style.display = "none";
        button.innerHTML = button.innerHTML.replace('▲', '▼');
      }
    }
</script>
